t: Amazon and The New York Times Announce an A.I. Licensing Deal - The New York Times
s: 4 days ago - In 2023, The Times sued OpenAI and Microsoft for copyright infringement. Now its editorial content will appear across Amazon platforms.

t: New York Times-Amazon AI Deal Affirms 'High-Quality Journalism Is Worth Paying For'
s: 2 days ago - The New York Times inks an AI deal with Amazon to license content for Alexa and other services, affirming journalism’s value in the age of generative AI.

t: New York Times partners with Amazon for first AI licensing deal | Reuters
s: 4 days ago - May 29 (Reuters) - The New York Times (NYT.N), opens new tab is allowing Amazon.com (AMZN.O), opens new tab to use its editorial content for artificial intelligence products such as Alexa, marking the publisher's first licensing deal tied to generative AI.

t: The New York Times and Amazon ink AI licensing deal | TechCrunch
